review: I thought becoming a prime member would allow me to watch any kind of shows I wanted,but not the case.
author: Sailanda Joseph

review: So far it is ok. Have not had time to play with it
author: Gary P.

review: I love the Fire TV! Awesome picture, super fast loading and very little lag.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It was definitely easy to set up.  It took a little while to figure out what was 'free' and what was 'pay'.  Still needed Hulu Plus and Netflix to see a huge amount of programs for less money.  My only criticism is that there is almost no 'conservative' or Christian programing.  Wish you had Fox News live streaming available!  If there were sports available, even a day or two later that would be great.
author: Charlen Carignan

review: Does everything its advertised to do.  Much easier to use and faster than the Aps in my blue-ray.
author: Steverizer
